statements: SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT age, gender, viewer_id, location FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT age, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, gender FROM viewer_demographics WHERE location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT viewer_id, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY viewer_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_viewers FROM viewer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%York%';
SELECT viewer_id, age, location FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' AND location IN ('New York', 'Los Angeles') ORDER BY viewer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM viewers WHERE age > 30
SELECT viewer_id, gender FROM viewers ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT location, gender FROM viewers WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT viewer_id, genre, rating FROM preferences WHERE genre = 'Action' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT viewer_id, age, location FROM viewers WHERE age < 25
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewers WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY gender DESC
SELECT viewer_id, genre, rating FROM preferences WHERE genre='Comedy' ORDER BY rating DESC
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewers WHERE gender='Male' AND location='New York'
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location, genre, rating FROM viewers JOIN preferences ON viewers.viewer_id = preferences.viewer_id WHERE age > 25 AND rating >= 5
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewers WHERE gender='Female' AND (age < 30 OR location='Los Angeles')
SELECT * FROM viewers;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM viewers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, category, rating FROM preferences WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, income, education_level FROM demographics WHERE income < 50000;
SELECT viewer_id, category, rating, location FROM preferences p JOIN viewers v ON p.viewer_id = v.viewer_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM viewers WHERE viewer_id = 1;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewers WHERE location = 'New York';

SELECT p.viewer_id, p.category, p.rating, v.age, d.income FROM preferences p JOIN demographics d ON p.viewer_id = d.viewer_id JOIN viewers v ON p.viewer_id = v.viewer_id WHERE d.education_level = 'Graduate';

SELECT v.viewer_id, v.gender, d.education_level, p.category, MAX(p.rating) AS max_rating FROM viewers v JOIN demographics d ON v.viewer_id = d.viewer_id JOIN preferences p ON v.viewer_id = p.viewer_id GROUP BY v.viewer_id, v.gender, d.education_level, p.category;

SELECT d.education_level, AVG(v.age) AS avg_age, AVG(d.income) AS avg_income FROM viewers v JOIN demographics d ON v.viewer_id = d.viewer_id GROUP BY d.education_level HAVING AVG(v.age) > 30 ORDER BY AVG(d.income) DESC;
SELECT * FROM ViewerDemographics;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM ViewerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, favorite_genre FROM ViewerPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT show_id, viewership_count, genre FROM ShowAnalytics ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM GenreTags WHERE genre_name LIKE 'D%';
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender, location FROM ViewerDemographics;
SELECT viewer_id, favorite_genre, favorite_show FROM ViewerPreferences WHERE favorite_genre = 'Comedy';
SELECT show_id, viewership_count, average_rating, genre FROM ShowAnalytics ORDER BY viewership_count DESC;
SELECT genre_id, genre_name FROM GenreTags WHERE genre_name LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT viewer_id, gender, location, favorite_genre, favorite_show FROM ViewerDemographics INNER JOIN ViewerPreferences ON ViewerDemographics.viewer_id = ViewerPreferences.viewer_id;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics;
SELECT viewer_id, age, gender FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT viewer_id, genre, rating FROM viewer_preferences WHERE rating >= 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM viewers_interaction WHERE viewer_id = 5;
SELECT viewer_id, action_taken, timestamp FROM viewer_activity ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM viewer_demographics WHERE age < 30;
SELECT viewer_id, gender FROM viewer_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT viewer_id, genre, rating FROM viewer_preferences WHERE rating > 4.0 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT viewer_id, interaction_type, timestamp FROM viewers_interaction WHERE viewer_id = 100 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT viewer_id, feedback_text FROM viewer_feedback WHERE rating < 3.0 AND timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
